radiographic_examinations.findings: Normal PET imaging of the dopamine transporter indicating no dopaminergic neuronal loss.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Striatal binding of [11C]raclopride increased by 25% vs control values.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Striatal binding of [11C]PE2I was similar to values obtained from healthy volunteers, indicating no dopaminergic neuronal loss.
